name: Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle
summary: Based in the world of Tyanaphos, Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle is a strategic solitaire card game inspired by Hanafuda (a traditional Japanese flower card game similar to mahjong or rummy), steeped in original Western fantasy and Tarot-like themes. Featuring a 144-card deck comprised of minor and major arcana and additional categories unique to Tyanaphos, as well as a customizable user interface, Nexus is next-level solitaire. Gameplay can be relaxing or challenging to your critical thinking skills depending on your approach. The rules expand on familiar solitaire mechanics, rewarding more creative set-building strategies with point rewards and achievements.
